mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_free_${clubIdx}(clubFreeIdx, userIdx, clubIdx, subject, content) VALUES(#{clubFreeIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{clubIdx}, #{subject}, #{content})

INSERT INTO club_freeP_${clubIdx}(clubFreePIdx, saveFilename, originalFilename, clubFreeIdx) VALUES(club_freeP_seq.NEXTVAL, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clubFreeIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_free_${clubSeq} n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userIdx=m.userIdx
mapper.update: UPDATE club_free_${clubSeq} SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE clubFreeIdx = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT clubFreeIdx, m.userIdx, userId, userName, subject, content ,hitCount, f.created FROM club_free_55 f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE clubFreeIdx = #{num}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubFreeIdx, subject FROM club_free_${clubSeq} f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userIdx=m.userIdx
AND (clubFreeIdx > #{num})
ORDER BY clubFreeIdx ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubFreeIdx, subject FROM club_free_${clubSeq} f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userIdx=m.userIdx
AND (clubFreeIdx < #{num})
ORDER BY clubFreeIdx DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.update: UPDATE club_free_${clubIdx} SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE clubFreeIdx = #{clubFreeIdx}
